title: Chicory and orange salad
ingredients: ['12 walnuts', '400g chicory - root and core removed, leaves shredded', '2 oranges, peeled and segmented', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', 'Dressing', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'salt', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons orange juice', 'ground black pepper to taste']
